bill.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds for improvements to state parks.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For The Purpose Of Making Improvements To State Parks; To Provide That The Principal Of And Interest On The Bonds Will Be Paid Primarily From Certain Fuel Tax Revenues Deposited Into A Bond Sinking Fund; To Amend Section 27-5-101, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform To The Provisions Of This Act; To Bring Forward Section 49-5-21, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Creates The Fisheries And Wildlife Fund In The State Treasury And Provides For The Use Of Monies In The Fund, For The Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
